# I. Load Parameters

```{r}

k_a = 100
r_a = 0.6

k_b = 100
r_b = 0.6

# Movement Parameters
M_ab = 0.9 # Adult movement A -> B 
M_ba = 1 # Adult movement B -> A 
M_aa = 1 - M_ab
M_bb = 1 - M_ba
D_ab = 1 # Larval dispersal A -> B 
D_ba = 1 # Larval dispersal B -> A
D_aa = 1 - D_ab
D_bb = 1 - D_ba

# High movement (0.8 both) low dispersal (0.2 both) "high low"
# Low movement (0.2 both) high dispersal (0.8 both) "low high"
# high movement (0.8 both) high dispersal (0.8 both) "high high"

# Survival Parameters
mu_a = 1
mu_b = 1
sigma_a = 1
sigma_b = 1

timesteps = 100

# Economic Parameters
p_a = 30
c_a = 20
p_b = 30
c_b = 20

# discount factor
delta = 0.95

# Adaptive parameters
size_x_a = 10 #size of the state grid A
size_x_b = 10 #size of B

T = 100 #time horizon for backward induction

small = 0.1

x_a_grid = seq(small, k_a,length.out=size_x_a)
x_b_grid = seq(small, k_b, length.out=size_x_b)

```
